description: This file defines a thread-safe Todo store class (`TodoStore`) that manages CRUD operations for todo items, supporting optional file-based persistence or in-memory operation. It includes functions for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, toggling, and deleting todo items with filtering, sorting, and pagination features.

classes.name: TodoStore
classes.description: Provides thread-safe CRUD operations for todo items, with optional persistence to disk or in-memory storage. Supports listing with filtering, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: __init__(self, persistence: str = "file", data_dir: Optional[str] = None, file_name: str = "todos.json")
methods.description: Initializes the TodoStore with specified persistence mode and data directory.

methods.name: None _load_from_disk(self)
methods.description: Loads existing todo items from disk if the store is file-backed.

methods.name: None _persist_locked(self)
methods.description: Persists the current list of todos to disk; assumes lock is held.

methods.name: Tuple[List[Dict[str,Any]],Dict[str,int]] list( self, search: Optional[str] = None, completed: Optional[bool] = None, sort_by: str = "created_at", sort_dir: str = "desc", page: int = 1, per_page: int = 20, )
methods.description: Returns a filtered, sorted, and paginated list of todo items along with metadata.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create(self, data: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with provided data, assigning a UUID and timestamps.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] get(self, todo_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves a todo item by its ID.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] update(self, todo_id: str, data: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing todo item identified by ID.

methods.name: Optional[Dict[str,Any]] toggle(self, todo_id: str)
methods.description: Inverts the 'completed' status of the specified todo item.

methods.name: bool delete(self, todo_id: str)
methods.description: Removes a todo item by its ID.
